item.description:
This event is for advanced speakers.

Learn what everybodies saying about this Meetup and discover who else is going. http://www.meetup.com/bostonspanish/events/16079587/

thank you for clicking and see you there!

Josh
item.how_to_find_us: We will be the HUGE group sitting next to the door speaking Spanish. :)
item.why: We will be meeting new Spanish speakers and practicing our Spanish. This celebration will be small because the cafe always fills up and to keep our group more small and intimate. There are always a lot of regulars and some new people. :)

group.name: The Boston Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Espanol en Brookline! Quien mas...
